text: Yesli zhe nisposylayetsya novaya sura, i prorok chitayet yeyo lyudyam, to litsemery smeyutsya, peremigivayas' drug s drugom, i govoryat: "Vidit li vas kto-nibud'?" I zatem oni ukhodyat s serdtsami, otvrashchonnymi ot very, ot proroka i ot Allakha. Allakh usilit ikh zabluzhdeniye, ibo oni pogryazli vo lzhi i neverii i uklonilis' ot istiny, potomu chto oni - lyudi nerazumnyye
